name: Turtle Run (affagard)
description:
Spitch

An athletic turtle, a rabbit, a race to win. A clear objective for the two runners, one no longer wants to be the laughing stock of the forest, the other absolutely wants to take revenge to regain his past glory! 

You will therefore embody the turtle during a crazy race in which the choice of course will be essential to win the race against the arrogant rabbit. 

Different types of assets
